Module jbubblebobble.jbubblebobble

Package jbubblebobble.controller

package jbubblebobble.controller
This package contains the classes that represent a bridge between the view and the model. also contains context classes that wraps the state of the application. The controllers are used to manage behaviors during the show of the different screens of the application. each controller is responsible for a different screen of the application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    jbubblebobble.controller.applicationstate
    this package contains the classes that represent the different states of the application.
    jbubblebobble.controller.command
    This package contains the classes that represent the different commands of the application.
    jbubblebobble.controller.gamestate
    This package contains the classes that represent the different states of the game.
  • Class
    Description
    ApplicationContext
    The application context is a singleton class that is used to store the application state and the user.
    ApplicationState
    Application state interface to be implemented by all the application states
    AudioManager
    Audio manager class used to play audio files.
    Command
    The interface Command.
    GameManager
    GameManager class used to handle the state of the game.
    GameState
    Game state interface to be implemented by all the game states The game states handle the behavior of the game in different states

    High score controller.
    JBubbleBobble
    JBubbleBobble launcher of the application.
    LevelController
    Level controller handle the game loop and the user input to control the player.

    The type Log in controller.
    LoseController
    Lose controller control the behavior of the view.
    MenuController
    Menu controller control the behavior of the view.
    ProfileController
    Profile controller control the behavior of the view.
    SelectAvatarController
    Select avatar controller control the Select Avatar screen.
